About.title: About Me
About.text: My name is Luis Diego Santos and I am a student at Universiadad del Valle de Guatemala. An avid enthusiast of anything related to technology, I want to create the software I always wished I had as a user. My hobbies include listening to music on obsolete physical formats, mountain biking, and repairing anything broken I can get my hands on. If I am not programming something new, you can probably find me recording from vinyl to cassettes.

content.title: Reddit React UI
content.desc: A clone of Reddit's main page created with React, Webpack, and many other modern web technologies.

content.title: Struum Roku
content.desc: Worked on Struum Roku as a junior developer, and later on, as the tech lead for the project.
